name: Arctic Infiltration Demo
description:
We are now live on Kickstarter

Please note that the demo is in alpha stage and does not represent the final game. The demo gives you an early experience of Arctic Infiltration. 

Arctic Infiltration
Descend, many miles, below the arctic surface and infiltrate a terrorist facility run by AI. Pilot a heavily armed submersible and explore interconnected passages. Pitch, yaw and strafe your way under water as you explore a terrorist hideout. Go full force with a wide variety of weaponry, or strategically combine them to defeat enemies as you experience this dark, claustrophobic and intense counter terrorism mission. Use your gadgets to free hostages, cut through ice and solve puzzles, find your objectives and eliminate the threat.

Features 

  • 360 degrees submersible combat against unique AI enemies and bosses.
  • State of the art 3D environments and enemies.
  • Weapons to wreak havoc on your enemies.
  • Gadgets to outsmart your enemies and infiltrate the facility with.
  • A haunting soundtrack and equally thrilling atmosphere.
